columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The instance type. For more information, see [ Instance Types ](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/instance-types.html) in the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud User Guide.

columns.name: auto_recovery_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether auto recovery is supported.

columns.name: bare_metal
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance is a bare metal instance type.

columns.name: burstable_performance_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance type is a burstable performance instance type.

columns.name: current_generation
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance type is current generation.

columns.name: dedicated_hosts_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether Dedicated Hosts are supported on the instance type.

columns.name: free_tier_eligible
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance type is eligible for the free tier.

columns.name: hibernation_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether On-Demand hibernation is supported.

columns.name: hypervisor
columns.description: The hypervisor for the instance type.

columns.name: instance_storage_supported
columns.description: Describes the instance storage for the instance type.

columns.name: ebs_info
columns.description: Describes the Amazon EBS settings for the instance type.

columns.name: memory_info
columns.description: Describes the memory for the instance type.

columns.name: network_info
columns.description: Describes the network settings for the instance type.

columns.name: placement_group_info
columns.description: Describes the placement group settings for the instance type.

columns.name: processor_info
columns.description: Describes the processor.

columns.name: supported_root_device_types
columns.description: The supported root device types.

columns.name: supported_usage_classes
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance type is offered for spot or On-Demand.

columns.name: supported_virtualization_types
columns.description: The supported virtualization types.

columns.name: v_cpu_info
columns.description: Describes the vCPU configurations for the instance type.

columns.name: gpu_info
columns.description: Describes the GPU accelerator settings for the instance type.
